bill_title: Honoring Olivia Olson of Waubay as the 2009 South Dakota Snow Queen.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Olivia Olson of Waubay as the 2009 South Dakota Snow Queen. WHEREAS, Olivia Olson, a senior at Waubay High School was chosen as the 2009 South Dakota Snow Queen; and WHEREAS, Olivia shows her diverse talents in her role as an actress in school plays and through her participation in track and volleyball, and she demonstrates her leadership abilities as a co-captain of her volleyball team and as president of the National Honor Society chapter at her high school; and WHEREAS, her grandfather, Maurice A. Olson, served as a member of the South Dakota House of Representatives for sixteen years, and on the Legislative Research Council Executive Board for three years: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Olivia Olson be congratulated upon her selection as the 2009 South Dakota Snow Queen.
